help-file.title: "REJUVENATE MAJOR"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: Yes Duration: Permanent Type of spell: Enchantment
This spell permanently reduces the victim's age, with the amount dependent on the proficiency of the caster. The reduction in age carries all the benefits and detriments normally associated with being younger. This is a temporary version of "Rejuvenate Major."
